title.label: Been pretty great so far but questionable.

content.label: So far my experience with this app has been well, the data you input into the app updates real time with your game so that you can customize whenever you want and you can see your position. However, the only thing that the app holds desirable is the map and in game customization feature. The map is already in game so why not make it so that you can customize in game as well? The app just seems like a useless attachment when instead you could just add the abilities of the app into the game.
